languages.text: Обуянные алчей, бились монахи и билась голытьба пришлая. Позабыли оне о нужде и о вере и дрались за одну только жадность. Заалели бранные поля, и пришлецы, устрашенные, утекли прочь, а братия отца Гектархиуса на костях стоять осталась и тризновать. Тогда изволил сойти к ним Вольный Торговец и златом их осыпал без меры, и уцелевших людишек пришлых похолопил да отдал монахам в услужение бесправное, и поил монахов вином, и вел прельстивые речи.

Seized by covetousness, the monks and rabble clashed. Their need and their faith forgotten, they fought for greed alone. The fields of battle turned crimson, and the interlopers in terror fled, while the brethren of Prelate Hectarchius remained behind, standing upon the bones and performing the solemn rites. Then the Rogue Trader came down to them and showered them with gold without measure, and {mf|he|she} took the surviving interlopers into bondage and gave them to the monks as beholden servants, and {mf|he|she} drank wine with the monks and regaled them with seductive oration.
languages.original_text: Обуянные алчей, бились монахи и билась голытьба пришлая. Позабыли оне о нужде и о вере и дрались за одну только жадность. languages.text: Presas de la avaricia, los monjes y la chusma lucharon. Olvidando sus necesidades y la fe, se enfrentaron por codicia, pura y simple. El campo de batalla se tiñó de escarlata y los intrusos, aterrados, huyeron mientras que los hermanos del prelado Hectarchius quedaron atrás, celebrando ritos solemnes sobre los huesos de los caídos. Entonces, {mf|el|la} Comerciante Independiente descendió para otorgarles cantidades inconmensurables de oro y, subyugando a los intrusos restantes, entregarlos como sirvientes a los monjes, con quienes bebió vino mientras les seducía con sus palabras.
languages.original_text: Seized by covetousness, the monks and rabble clashed. Their need and their faith forgotten, they fought for greed alone. The fields of battle turned crimson, and the interlopers in terror fled, while the brethren of Prelate Hectarchius remained behind, standing upon the bones and performing the solemn rites. Then the Rogue Trader came down to them and showered them with gold without measure, and {mf|he|she} took the surviving interlopers into bondage and gave them to the monks as beholden servants, and {mf|he|she} drank wine with the monks and regaled them with seductive oration.

languages.text: 欲に駆られて、修道士と暴徒は激しくぶつかり合う。都合も信仰心も頭から抜けて、彼らは欲望のためだけに戦った。戦場は真っ赤に染まり、侵入者たちは恐怖のあまり逃げ出したが、上級聖職者ヘクターキウスの仲間たちはその場に残り、骨の上に立って厳粛な儀式を行った。その時、ローグトレーダーが彼らのもとへやって来て、加減など無視して金を投げつける。そして{mf|彼|彼女}は生き残った侵入者を拘束して、これを従順な召使いにして使えと修道士たちに引き渡し、彼らとワインを交えながら巧みな話術で楽しませたのだった。
languages.original_text: Seized by covetousness, the monks and rabble clashed. Their need and their faith forgotten, they fought for greed alone. The fields of battle turned crimson, and the interlopers in terror fled, while the brethren of Prelate Hectarchius remained behind, standing upon the bones and performing the solemn rites. Then the Rogue Trader came down to them and showered them with gold without measure, and {mf|he|she} took the surviving interlopers into bondage and gave them to the monks as beholden servants, and {mf|he|she} drank wine with the monks and regaled them with seductive oration.

traits.locale_text: 欲に駆られて、修道士と暴徒は激しくぶつかり合う。都合も信仰心も頭から抜けて、彼らは欲望のためだけに戦った。戦場は真っ赤に染まり、侵入者たちは恐怖のあまり逃げ出したが、上級聖職者ヘクターキウスの仲間たちはその場に残り、骨の上に立って厳粛な儀式を行った。その時、ローグトレーダーが彼らのもとへやって来て、加減など無視して金を投げつける。そして{mf|彼|彼女}は生き残った侵入者を拘束して、これを従順な召使いにして使えと修道士たちに引き渡し、彼らとワインを交えながら巧みな話術で楽しませたのだった。

languages.text: 在贪婪的驱使下，修道院的僧侣与外来的暴民展开了厮杀。所有人都忘记了自己的目标与信仰，仅仅为了利益而战。鲜血染红了战场，外来者在惊恐中四散而逃，而赫克塔奇乌斯教长的信徒留在后方，在尸骨之上举行了庄严的仪式。在那之后，行商浪人来到了僧侣面前，洒下了无数金银财宝。{mf|他|她}将幸存的外来者关在笼子里，把他们交给僧侣当奴隶。不仅如此，{mf|他|她}还与僧侣们一起纵情畅饮，以甜言蜜语让那些人声色犬马。
languages.original_text: Seized by covetousness, the monks and rabble clashed. Their need and their faith forgotten, they fought for greed alone. The fields of battle turned crimson, and the interlopers in terror fled, while the brethren of Prelate Hectarchius remained behind, standing upon the bones and performing the solemn rites. Then the Rogue Trader came down to them and showered them with gold without measure, and {mf|he|she} took the surviving interlopers into bondage and gave them to the monks as beholden servants, and {mf|he|she} drank wine with the monks and regaled them with seductive oration.

languages.text: Les moines et la populace mordent à l'appât du gain et se lancent à l'attaque les uns des autres. Oubliant leurs besoins et leur foi, ils se battent uniquement par cupidité. Les champs de bataille se teignent de rouge et les intrus terrorisés finissent par prendre la fuite, tandis que les frères du prélat Hectarchius, toujours debout parmi les cadavres, offrent les derniers sacrements aux victimes. Puis {mf|le libre-marchand|la libre-marchande} vient les couvrir d'or, capture les intrus survivants pour les mettre au service des moines, et boit du vin avec les vainqueurs tout en les régalant d'un discours captivant.
languages.original_text: Seized by covetousness, the monks and rabble clashed. Their need and their faith forgotten, they fought for greed alone. The fields of battle turned crimson, and the interlopers in terror fled, while the brethren of Prelate Hectarchius remained behind, standing upon the bones and performing the solemn rites. Then the Rogue Trader came down to them and showered them with gold without measure, and {mf|he|she} took the surviving interlopers into bondage and gave them to the monks as beholden servants, and {mf|he|she} drank wine with the monks and regaled them with seductive oration.

languages.text: Von Habsucht erfasst, prallten Mönche und Gesindel aufeinander. Sie vergaßen ihre Not und ihren Glauben und kämpften allein aus Gier. Das Schlachtfeld färbte sich rot, und während die Eindringlinge entsetzt flohen, blieben die Brüder von Prälat Hectarchius zurück und feierten auf den Knochen ihre feierlichen Riten. Dann kam {mf|der Freihändler|die Freihändlerin} zu ihnen herab und überhäufte sie mit Gold, ehe {mf|er|sie} die überlebenden Eindringlinge in Ketten legte und den Mönchen als willfährige Diener überließ, während {mf|er|sie} mit den Mönchen Wein trank und sie mit verführerischen Reden ergötzte.
languages.original_text: Seized by covetousness, the monks and rabble clashed. Their need and their faith forgotten, they fought for greed alone. The fields of battle turned crimson, and the interlopers in terror fled, while the brethren of Prelate Hectarchius remained behind, standing upon the bones and performing the solemn rites. Then the Rogue Trader came down to them and showered them with gold without measure, and {mf|he|she} took the surviving interlopers into bondage and gave them to the monks as beholden servants, and {mf|he|she} drank wine with the monks and regaled them with seductive oration.
